extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100;DRAM181; BISC100;BISC101) or permission of the Department.

basic.description: An examination of the major trends in musical theatre production and theory since the 19th century, exploring the work of important composers and lyricists and the structure of musical theatre works.
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Musical Theatre
